steps.step: Fill a tall glass with ice cubes, and fill 1/3 full with grapefruit juice. Top up the remaining 2/3 with ginger ale, then add some cranberries and mint leaves for garnish if you like!

Starting with the yogurt, layer your parfait with the yogurt, then preserves, then granola and then raspberries.The number of times that you can layer your parfait depends on the size of your container.  I was able to layer it twice in my jam jar.  Enjoy!
Wash strawberries.
Remove the tops and then cut into slices from the top to the bottom.
Mix the strawberry slices with the sugar and lemon juice and gently toss together. Set to the side

Place 3 tablespoons of strawberries in the bottom of a small glass jar, top with  crumbled graham cracker, cover with 2 heaping tablespoons of cool whip. Repeat layers. End with cool whip and then use remaining crumbs over the top of the cool whip.Chill for 24 hours if possible, but it is ready to eat immediately if there is no time.
Heat one teaspoon (5 ml) of olive oil in a pan. Fry garlic until lightly golden.
Remove from heat and set aside.
Place the basil, parsley, nutritional yeast flakes, and the remaining olive oil into a food processor or blender.
Add the warm garlic.Blend until smooth, scraping down the sides of the bowl.
Add lemon juice and salt.
Mix well.Store in a sealed container in the fridge for no longer than 4 days.
Put all ingredients into a jar with a tight lid and shake until well combined.Alternatively, mix ingredients together in a medium bowl with a whisk.This recipe makes about 1 1/2 cups of dressing.
Mix all the ingredients in a medium size bowl.
Serve!

Place all the ingredients into a blender and blend really well. The soup should be thick but not as thick as a puree. If you used canned coconut milk instead of coconut milk from a carton, you may need to add water to get a thinner texture.Chill in fridge for 5-10 minutes and serve.

title: No-Cook Refreshing Mint Avocado Chilled Soup

steps.step: Brush the slices of turkey with ranch dressing.Stuff each half of pita with a a few slices of tomato, greens, a slice of turkey, and two slices of bacon.
Serve.
Combine tomatoes, olives, lemon juice, pepper, garlic, and onions in a medium sized airtight container.
Allow marinating in the refrigerator overnight if this is an option.
Top with shredded parmesan cheese before serving.

title: Quick and Easy Tomato Salad Recipe

steps.step: In a medium saucepan, melt the butter, marshmallows and milk.In a food processor, process graham crackers until fine.  Set aside in a large bowl.
Place the  M and Ms in the food processor and give a few good chops.
Combine the M and Ms with graham crackers.

Add the Rice Krispies and stir until combined.Gently pour the melted marshmallow into Rice Krispie mixture mix until well combined.Butter a  9x13 baking dish.Spoon the Rice Krispie mixture into the prepared baking dish and flatten with a spatula.Cover and refrigerate for several hours until set.
Mix ricotta cheese, Greek yogurt, extra-virgin olive oil, lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper
Taste, add more of any of the above to your liking
Add garlic, basil, parsley, and sage
Taste, add salt and pepper if necessary
Mix well, drizzle some extra-virgin olive oil on top, and serve with your favorite dippers
Cut all vegetables into chunks and place in a food processor or a large bowl.
Add bread, water, garlic, olive oil, vinegar, and salt.Using a food processor or a hand blender blend until the soup is smooth.
Place in your fridge to cool down for at least an hour.
Serve in a bowl/jar/glass with some ice cubes.
Place all ingredients in food processor and blend together until mixed well, about 10 seconds.
Serve with pita chips, veggie chips, pretzels, carrots, celery, or anything else you like dipping! Enjoy!

title: Make this Creamy, Refreshing Dip & Be Ready for a Party in Less than 5 Minutes

steps.step: Combine the chicken, relish, celery, mayonnaise, eggs, and salt and pepper until mixed well.
Add lettuce leaves to sliced bread
Top the bread with chicken salad and serve.

title: Copycat Chick Fil A Chicken Salad

steps.step: In a bowl, whisk together lemon, olive oil, Dijon mustard, and Worcestershire sauce.
Add mayonnaise and whisk again until smooth and creamy.

If you’re using anchovy fillets, mash them well with a fork until they’re nearly reached a paste consistency. You want it to mix well throughout all of the dressing. If you’re using anchovy paste, skip this step.
Add remaining ingredients and mix everything together well with a spoon.
Add freshly ground pepper to taste.
Serve and enjoy!
